content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: dark_oak_boat
inventory=[{"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 5, "index": 13}, {"type": "red_nether_bricks", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "lime_dye", "quantity": 55, "index": 18}, {"type": "skeleton_spawn_egg", "quantity": 35, "index": 21}, {"type": "dead_bubble_coral_block", "quantity": 56, "index": 37}, {"type": "orange_wool", "quantity": 51, "index": 38}, {"type": "arrow", "quantity": 10, "index": 39}, {"type": "end_stone_brick_stairs", "quantity": 31, "index": 43}, {"type": "quartz_slab", "quantity": 18, "index": 45}]
thought: To craft a dark_oak_boat, I need to place 5 dark_oak_planks in a U shape in the crafting grid. I will first move 1 dark_oak_plank from slot 13 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 13 to slot 1 with quantity 1
